import React, { useEffect } from "react"; // Đảm bảo bạn import đúng đường dẫn component FadeIn // Nếu file FadeIn cùng thư mục components thì để ./FadeIn import FadeIn from "./FadeIn"; const PrivacyPolicy: React.FC = () => { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); return (

Privacy Policy

Last updated: November 20, 2025

Phan Quang Duy ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how your personal information is collected, used, and disclosed by{" "} EasyWrite AI ("the App").

By accessing or using our Service, you signify that you have read, understood, and agree to our collection, storage, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service.

1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT

We collect information to provide better services to all our users.

A. Information You Provide to Us

  • Input Data: When you use the "Grammar Check," "Rewrite," or "Email Generator" features, you provide text input. This text is processed to provide the service but is not permanently stored on our servers unless you explicitly save it to your "History" or "Notebook."
  • Account Information: If you register an account (via Firebase Auth), we may collect your email address and name.

B. Information Collected Automatically

  • Usage Data: We collect information about how you interact with our App, such as feature usage, crash logs, and performance data.
  • Device Information: We may collect information about your mobile device, including IP address, device model, operating system version, and unique device identifiers (Advertising ID).

2. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

We use the information we collect for various purposes, including to:

  • Provide, operate, and maintain our App.
  • Process AI Features: Your text input is sent to Google Gemini API to perform grammar checking and content generation.
  • Improve, personalize, and expand our App.
  • Analyze how you use our App.
  • Show advertisements (via Google AdMob) to support the free version of the App.

3. THIRD-PARTY SERVICES

We maintain formatting and data integrity by using trusted third-party service providers. By using our App, you acknowledge that your data may be processed by these parties:

  • Google Gemini API: We use Google's generative AI to process your text. Google may use this data to improve their services in accordance with their privacy policy.
  • Google AdMob: Used to display advertisements. AdMob may collect data to show personalized ads.
  • Firebase (Google): Used for authentication, database storage, and analytics.

4. DATA RETENTION

We will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. Input text sent to AI is transient and processed immediately.

5. SECURITY OF YOUR DATA

The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

6. CHILDREN'S PRIVACY

Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13.

7. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

8. CONTACT US

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

  • By email:{" "} support@easywrite.com
); }; export default PrivacyPolicy;
